name: Butterfliez & Beez
description:
Come along with me, and the butterflies and bees... 

The goal of the game is simply to kill catch the butterflies and bees using your net and avoid getting killed stung.

This game is best played by two players, but you can try test it solo if your have good hands coordination.

 This game is part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme of the jam is : "Joined together".

I choose to take the theme litteraly by joining the two player together with the net. If they get too far from each other they will bounce back.

This is my first released game and my first participation in a game jam. Be kind and enjoy.

PS : Bees & butterflies are friends. Please do not harm or try to catch them IRL.
